Package org.restlet.ext.openid

Support for OpenID 2.0 HTTP authentication.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AttributeExchange Describes an attributes exchange, also known as an AX.
OpenIdFormForwarder Utility class.
OpenIdVerifier Verifier that will do remote verification of using a provided openid_identifier.
RedirectAuthenticator An authenticator that redirects the authentication to some external resource.
RelayingParty Describes a relaying party, also known as a RP.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.openid Description

Support for OpenID 2.0 HTTP authentication. Leverages the OpenID4Java 0.9 library.

Since:
Restlet 2.1
Author:
Kristoffer Gronowski, Martin Svensson
See Also:
OpenID Foundation, OpenID4Java home, User Guide - OpenID extension
